Voice Communications Engineer

Extraordinarily intelligent, resourceful, and articulate engineer
sought
to maintain, improve, and extend a complex, integrated voice and data
environment. The Voice Communications Engineer will be responsible for
troubleshooting and resolving communication issues and will oversee
voice/data/fiber cabling installation and maintenance.

The ideal candidate would have an undergraduate Computer Science or
Engineering degree, a strong understanding of telecommunications and
computer systems, and excellent verbal and written communication
skills.
Previous programming, systems administration, or help desk experience
is
a plus.

We are particularly interested in applicants with exposure to leased
circuits, Nortel Meridian PBX, voice recording, complex trading
environments, Cisco routers, VoIP, and VPN, as well as experience
installing, testing, and maintaining premise wiring (cat. 5 and 6).
However, we are prepared to provide training for an engineer who has
excellent raw ability and a serious commitment to the position.

We are seeking an exceptionally well-qualified candidate, and are
prepared to offer an extremely attractive compensation package. Please
send your resume and cover letter (with GPA and SAT, GRE and/or other
test scores)

To apply contact Dave Bruun [dave.bruun@hiretoptalent.com]
